HTTP Routing Table

/add_check | /add_plan | /delete_check | /delete_plan | /get_plan | /get_plans | /update_plan | /url
 
/add_check
GET /add_check/(plan)/(check)
 
/add_plan
POST /add_plan
 
/delete_check
GET /delete_check/(plan)/(check)
 
/delete_plan
GET /delete_plan/(name)
 
/get_plan
GET /get_plan/(name)
 
/get_plans
GET /get_plans
 
/update_plan
POST /update_plan
 
/url
GET /url
